Title: Come to Jesus
Writer: Neil Gaiman (based on the book by), Michael Green (developed for television by), Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Bekah Brunstetter (teleplay by), Michael Green (teleplay by), Bryan Fuller (teleplay by), Maria Melnik (staff writer)
Actors: Ricky Whittle, Emily Browning, Crispin Glover, Bruce Langley
Plot: On the eve of war, Mr. Wednesday attempts to recruit the Old God Ostara, but needs Mr. Nancy's help in making a good impression and winning her over.
